markers.marker: Used to activate a 1-time line when Lucina sees Captain Falcon for the first time during a game.
Lucina accepts her 2nd defeat to Captain Falcon.
Lucina asks Catria who the man she speaks of is
Used to activate a 1-time line when the player strips a piece of clothing for the first time during a game.
Lucina pulls up a crate after masturbating.
